title: Incorrect connect Method Overload Called Without Username and Password
body:
for me the MQTT connection failed with rc=5 (Not authorized) when using the PubSubClient::connect() method. The issue occurred because the wrong method overload was used, omitting the username and password parameters. This led to authentication failure with the MQTT broker. 

I changed it from:
client.connect(clientId.c_str(), String(mqttRootTopic + "/" + clientId + "/availability").c_str(), 1, true, "offline");

to:
client.connect(clientId.c_str(), mqttUser, mqttPassword, String(mqttRootTopic + "/" + clientId + "/availability").c_str(), 1, true, "offline");

and then it worked for me

I only found this using chatgpt tbh
author: oli-19
